name: Verest
description:
Venture out of your home for the first time, as part of your new job as the village gatherer.  Explore exotic locations, from the scenic Hanging Forests, to the decayed Work Zone, and more. Be wary though, many travellers have lost their way in these wilds, led astray by the creatures of darkness.

A controller / gamepad is recommended

Jump:  Space / 
Attack:  X / 
Map:  Tab / 
Pause: Esc / 

Ctrl + Shift + P to delete save data

The team:

JUSTCAMH - Art, Game Design and Code
ClockMaker - Music and Sound Effects

Get the game's awesome soundtrack!

Demo

We put a lot of effort into our game, but unfortunately we couldn't quite complete it in a month. This version is a demo, with a lot of paths unfortunately blocked off. We really want to develop this game further, so if you enjoyed, please let us know, and follow us for updates! We'll need your feedback to improve the game and its future versions! There's still plenty of stuff for you to do in this version, there's just less paths to choose from.

Game made in a month  for Metroidvania Month 6.
Font: Cat Pentagram by Noé
